name: part_000
file: tmp_Yozora Mel stream (Oct 31, 2022)【ホロライブ ⧸ 3DLIVE】ハロウィンのお姫様  Halloween Princess 【#夜空メル爆誕2022】 [WbNkG3kbOHo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro sequence showcasing various character art and event details.
Yozora Mel performs 'Wagamama Hime' on a 3D stage.

subtitles.original: YOZORA MEL BIRTHDAY LIVE
subtitles.english: YOZORA MEL BIRTHDAY LIVE

subtitles.original: October 31 YOZORA MEL BIRTHDAY
subtitles.english: October 31 YOZORA MEL BIRTHDAY

subtitles.original: Halloween Princess ハロウィンのお姫様
subtitles.english: Halloween Princess

subtitles.original: 我儘姫 作詞・作曲：ふじを
subtitles.english:
Wagamama Hime
Lyrics/Composition: Fujio

subtitles.original: 1, 2, 3 不思議なステップで
subtitles.english: 1, 2, 3, with mysterious steps...

subtitles.original: 踊り出すビート 宵に輝くネオンの下で光る
subtitles.english: ...the beat starts dancing, shining under the evening neon lights.

subtitles.original: 私、可愛い？可愛い？お召使いたち あの子はどこに？
subtitles.english: Am I cute? Cute? My servants, where is that girl?

subtitles.original: うだうだ ごたごた どらどら ぎゃんぎゃん 何も知ることない
subtitles.english: Idle chatter, trouble, sluggishly, noisily, there's nothing you need to know.

subtitles.original: 甘い甘いチョコが食べたい
subtitles.english: I want to eat sweet, sweet chocolate.

subtitles.original: 熱い熱いラテが飲みたい
subtitles.english: I want to drink hot, hot latte.

subtitles.original: ホクホクのパンが食べたいな ダメ？
subtitles.english: I want to eat warm, fluffy bread. Is that no good?

subtitles.original: とろとろのチーズが食べたい
subtitles.english: I want to eat gooey cheese.

subtitles.original: ふかふかのベッドで寝たい
subtitles.english: I want to sleep in a soft bed.

subtitles.original: うとうと おやすみなさい UPPY
subtitles.english: Dozing off, good night. UPPY.

subtitles.original: わがまま ラン・ラン・ラン・ラン
subtitles.english: Selfish run-run-run-run,

subtitles.original: 私のこと笑わないで 私、可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: don't laugh at me. I'm cute, aren't I?

subtitles.original: お願い GIVE GIVE GIVE EVERYTHING あたいを助けて
subtitles.english: Please GIVE GIVE GIVE EVERYTHING, help me.

subtitles.original: 何もかも許される
subtitles.english: Everything is forgiven.

subtitles.original: だって私が一番可愛いんだから
subtitles.english: Because I'm the cutest one of all.

subtitles.original: 3, 2, 1 香ばしい匂いで
subtitles.english: 3, 2, 1, with a savory scent...

subtitles.original: おびき出すビート 宵に月明かりの下で 誰をやる？
subtitles.english: ...the beat lures you out, under the evening moonlight, who will you do it to?

subtitles.original: ギロチン 銃殺 火あぶり 切腹 お好きなオプションで
subtitles.english: Guillotine, execution by shooting, burning at the stake, seppuku, with your favorite option.

subtitles.original: 誰も私には逆らえない つまらない
subtitles.english: No one can defy me. How boring.

subtitles.original: 苦い苦いキモが食べたい
subtitles.english: I want to eat bitter, bitter liver.

subtitles.original: 赤い赤いスープ飲みたい
subtitles.english: I want to drink red, red soup.

subtitles.original: ホクホクお肉食べたいの さあ
subtitles.english: I want to eat warm, juicy meat. Now...

subtitles.original: 甘い甘いそれじゃ足りない
subtitles.english: Sweet, sweet things are not enough.

subtitles.original: 油断した面も見せて
subtitles.english: Show me your unguarded face.

subtitles.original: ラランララランラララン ホラ まだまだまだまだ足りないわ
subtitles.english: La-lan-la-la-lan-la-la-lan, see, it's still not enough.

subtitles.original: わがまま 私のこと愛してくれる
subtitles.english: Selfish, waiting for someone...

subtitles.original: 誰かを待っているの
subtitles.english: ...who will love me.

subtitles.original: 孤独な夜空に一人 惑うフリをして
subtitles.english: Alone in the lonely night sky, pretending to be lost.
